sub_title: Backoffice commercial assistant Benelux at Royal Talens
summary: Specialist in European Commercial Communication with core experience of the French and Benelux market and futhermore Germany and the UK. Skilled in reaching both customers and B2B clients, for both retail and internet industries. Various branches and product knowledges from banking to knives and tools, furniture, higher education supply or health and beauty.
